list.title: DSTWriter
list.description: Class for writing Tajima DST embroidery files.

list.title: DSTWriter#saveDST
list.description: Saves embroidery data as a DST file.

list.title: Thread
list.description: Creates a new Thread instance.

list.title: beginRecord
list.description: Begins recording embroidery data.

list.title: embroideryOutline
list.description: Adds an outline around the embroidery at a specified offset distance.

list.title: endRecord
list.description: Ends recording and prepares for export.

list.title: exportDST
list.description: Exports the recorded embroidery data as a DST file.

list.title: exportEmbroidery
list.description: Exports the recorded embroidery data as a file. Supported formats: DST (.dst), SVG (.svg), PNG (.png), JSON (.json)

list.title: exportGcode
list.description: Exports the recorded embroidery data as a G-code file.

list.title: exportJSON
list.description: Exports the recorded embroidery data as a JSON file with detailed stitch information organized by thread ID.

list.title: exportPNG
list.description: Exports embroidery pattern as PNG for printing templates.

list.title: exportSVG
list.description: Exports embroidery pattern as SVG for printing templates.

list.title: mmToPixel
list.description: Converts millimeters to pixels.

list.title: pixelToMm
list.description: Converts pixels to millimeters.

list.title: setDrawMode
list.description: Sets the draw mode for embroidery.

list.title: setFillMode
list.description: Sets the fill mode for embroidery fills.

list.title: setFillSettings
list.description: Sets the fill settings for embroidery.

list.title: setFillSettings
list.description: Sets the fill settings for embroidery.

list.title: setStitch
list.description: Sets the stitch parameters for embroidery.

list.title: setStrokeEntryExit
list.description: Sets the stroke chirality for embroidery stitches.

list.title: setStrokeJoin
list.description: Sets the stroke join mode for embroidery stitches.

list.title: setStrokeMode
list.description: Sets the stroke mode for embroidery stitches.

list.title: setStrokeSettings
list.description: Sets the stroke settings for embroidery.

list.title: trimThread
list.description: Inserts a thread trim command at the current position.
